detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract PointwishToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#62-80) has payable functions:
	 - PointwishToken.receive() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PointwishToken.sol#75-77)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
